remarks.format:
## Remarks The TrackingMode enumeration specifies whether or not changes that are made to items in the collection are tracked automatically.
Values from the TrackingMode enumeration are used when you create a new instance of the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> class.
